trans-unit.source: Stores a set of four integers that represent the location and size of a rectangle
trans-unit.target: Armazena um conjunto de quatro números inteiros que representa o local e o tamanho de um retângulo

trans-unit.source: A rectangle is defined by its <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Width%2A>, <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Height%2A>, and upper-left corner represented by the <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Location%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Um retângulo é definido por seu <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Width%2A>, <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Height%2A>e o canto superior esquerdo representado pelo <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Location%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Location%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Height%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Width%2A>

trans-unit.source: To draw rectangles, you need a <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object and a <xref:System.Drawing.Pen> object.
trans-unit.target: Para desenhar retângulos, é necessário um <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>objeto e um <xref:System.Drawing.Pen>objeto.</xref:System.Drawing.Pen> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object provides the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawRectangle%2A> method, and the <xref:System.Drawing.Pen> object stores features of the line, such as color and width.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>objeto fornece o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawRectangle%2A>método e o <xref:System.Drawing.Pen>objeto armazena recursos da linha, como cor e largura.</xref:System.Drawing.Pen> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawRectangle%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: The units the rectangle is drawn in is determined by the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.PageUnit%2A> and <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.PageScale%2A> properties of the graphics object used for drawing.
trans-unit.target: As unidades que o retângulo é desenhado em é determinado pelo <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.PageUnit%2A>e <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.PageScale%2A>Propriedades dos gráficos de objeto usado para desenhar.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.PageScale%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.PageUnit%2A>

trans-unit.source: The default unit is pixels.
trans-unit.target: A unidade padrão é pixels.

trans-unit.source: To draw a Rectangle filled with color, you need a <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object and an object derived from <xref:System.Drawing.Brush> such as <xref:System.Drawing.SolidBrush> or <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.LinearGradientBrush>.
trans-unit.target: Para desenhar um retângulo preenchido com cores, você precisa de um <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>objeto e um objeto derivado de <xref:System.Drawing.Brush>como <xref:System.Drawing.SolidBrush>ou <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.LinearGradientBrush>.</xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.LinearGradientBrush> </xref:System.Drawing.SolidBrush> </xref:System.Drawing.Brush> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object provides the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.FillRectangle%2A> method and the <xref:System.Drawing.Brush> object provides the color and fill information.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>objeto fornece o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.FillRectangle%2A>método e o <xref:System.Drawing.Brush>objeto fornece as informações de cor e preenchimento.</xref:System.Drawing.Brush> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.FillRectangle%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: For more advanced shapes, use a <xref:System.Drawing.Region> object.
trans-unit.target: Para formas mais avançadas, use um <xref:System.Drawing.Region>objeto.</xref:System.Drawing.Region>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> class with the specified location and size.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> classe com o local especificado e o tamanho.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> that represents the upper-left corner of the rectangular region.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"> </xref> que representa o canto superior esquerdo da região retangular.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> that represents the width and height of the rectangular region.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"> </xref> que representa a largura e altura da região retangular.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> class with the specified location and size.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> classe com o local especificado e o tamanho.

trans-unit.source: The x-coordinate of the upper-left corner of the rectangle.
trans-unit.target: A coordenada x do canto superior esquerdo do retângulo.

trans-unit.source: The y-coordinate of the upper-left corner of the rectangle.
trans-unit.target: A coordenada y do canto superior esquerdo do retângulo.

trans-unit.source: The width of the rectangle.
trans-unit.target: A largura do retângulo.

trans-unit.source: The height of the rectangle.
trans-unit.target: A altura do retângulo.

trans-unit.source: Gets the y-coordinate that is the sum of the <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Y*> and <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Height*> property values of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> structure.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a coordenada y é a soma da <> </> *> e <> </> *> valores de propriedade deste <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> estrutura.

trans-unit.source: The value of the Bottom property represents the y-coordinate of the first point at the bottom edge of the <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle> that is not contained in the <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle>.
trans-unit.target: O valor da propriedade inferior representa a coordenada y do primeiro ponto na borda inferior do <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle>que não está contido em <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle>.</xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle> </xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle>

trans-unit.source: The y-coordinate that is the sum of <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Y*> and <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Height*> of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A coordenada y é a soma de <> </> *> e <> </> *> deste <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Converts the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"></xref> structure to a <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> structure by rounding the <xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"></xref> values to the next higher integer values.
trans-unit.target: Converte especificado <xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"> </xref> estrutura para um <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> estrutura, arredondando a <xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"> </xref> valores para os valores de número inteiro mais próximos.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"></xref> structure to be converted.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"> </xref> estrutura a ser convertido.

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Retorna um <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Determines if the specified point is contained within this <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> structure.
trans-unit.target: Determina se o ponto especificado está contido dentro deste <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> estrutura.

trans-unit.source: The containing rectangle must be normalized for this method to return accurate results.
trans-unit.target: O retângulo que contém deverão ser normalizado para este método retornar resultados precisos.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> to test.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"> </xref> para testar.

trans-unit.source: This method returns if the point represented by pt is contained within this structure; otherwise .
trans-unit.target: Este método retorna se o ponto representado por pt está contida dentro deste estrutura; caso contrário, .

trans-unit.source: Determines if the rectangular region represented by rect is entirely contained within this structure.
trans-unit.target: Determina se a região retangular representado pelo rect totalmente contido dentro deste estrutura.

trans-unit.source: The containing rectangle must be normalized for this method to return accurate results.
trans-unit.target: O retângulo que contém deverão ser normalizado para este método retornar resultados precisos.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> to test.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> para testar.

trans-unit.source: This method returns if the rectangular region represented by rect is entirely contained within this structure; otherwise .
trans-unit.target: Este método retorna se a região retangular representados por rect totalmente contido dentro deste estrutura; caso contrário, .

trans-unit.source: Determines if the specified point is contained within this <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> structure.
trans-unit.target: Determina se o ponto especificado está contido dentro deste <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> estrutura.

trans-unit.source: The containing rectangle must be normalized for this method to return accurate results.
trans-unit.target: O retângulo que contém deverão ser normalizado para este método retornar resultados precisos.

trans-unit.source: The x-coordinate of the point to test.
trans-unit.target: A coordenada x do ponto de teste.

trans-unit.source: The y-coordinate of the point to test.
trans-unit.target: A coordenada y do ponto de teste.

trans-unit.source: This method returns if the point defined by x and y is contained within this structure; otherwise .
trans-unit.target: Este método retorna se o ponto definido por x e y está contida dentro deste estrutura; caso contrário, .

trans-unit.source: Represents a <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> structure with its properties left uninitialized.
trans-unit.target: Representa um <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> estrutura com suas propriedades à esquerda não inicializado.

trans-unit.source: A rectangle is defined by its width, height and upper-left corner.
trans-unit.target: Um retângulo é definido pela largura, altura e canto superior esquerdo.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Tests whether obj is a structure with the same location and size of this structure.
trans-unit.target: Testes se obj é um estrutura com o mesmo local e tamanho estrutura.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object> to test.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object>Para teste.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: This method returns if obj is a structure and its , , , and properties are equal to the corresponding properties of this structure; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: Este método retorna se obj é um estrutura e seus <> *>, <> *>, <> *>, e <> *> propriedades são iguais das propriedades correspondentes disso estrutura; caso contrário, .

trans-unit.source: Creates a <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> structure with the specified edge locations.
trans-unit.target: Cria um <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> estrutura com os locais de borda especificado.

trans-unit.source: This method creates a <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle> with the specified upper-left and lower-right corners.
trans-unit.target: Esse método cria um <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle>com os cantos superior esquerdo e direito inferior especificados.</xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle>

trans-unit.source: The x-coordinate of the upper-left corner of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> structure.
trans-unit.target: A coordenada x do canto superior esquerdo desta <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> estrutura.

trans-unit.source: The y-coordinate of the upper-left corner of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> structure.
trans-unit.target: A coordenada y do canto superior esquerdo desta <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> estrutura.

trans-unit.source: The x-coordinate of the lower-right corner of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> structure.
trans-unit.target: A coordenada x do canto inferior direito deste <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> estrutura.

trans-unit.source: The y-coordinate of the lower-right corner of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> structure.
trans-unit.target: A coordenada y do canto inferior direito desta <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> estrutura.

trans-unit.source: The new <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that this method creates.
trans-unit.target: O novo <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> que esse método cria.

trans-unit.source: Returns the hash code for this <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> structure.
trans-unit.target: Retorna o código hash para este <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> estrutura.

trans-unit.source: For information about the use of hash codes, see <xref:System.Object.GetHashCode*> .
trans-unit.target: Para obter informações sobre o uso de códigos hash, consulte <xref:System.Object.GetHashCode*>.</xref:System.Object.GetHashCode*>

trans-unit.source: An integer that represents the hash code for this rectangle.
trans-unit.target: Um inteiro que representa o código hash para esse retângulo.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the height of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> structure.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a altura deste <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> estrutura.

trans-unit.source: Changing the Height property will also cause a change in the <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Bottom%2A> property of the <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle>.
trans-unit.target: Alterar a propriedade de altura também fará com que uma alteração na <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Bottom%2A>propriedade de <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle>.</xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle> </xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Bottom%2A>

trans-unit.source: The units the rectangle is drawn in is determined by the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.PageUnit%2A> and <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.PageScale%2A> properties of the graphics object used for drawing.
trans-unit.target: As unidades que o retângulo é desenhado em é determinado pelo <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.PageUnit%2A>e <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.PageScale%2A>Propriedades dos gráficos de objeto usado para desenhar.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.PageScale%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.PageUnit%2A>

trans-unit.source: The default unit is pixels.
trans-unit.target: A unidade padrão é pixels.

trans-unit.source: The height of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> structure.
trans-unit.target: A altura deste <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> estrutura.

trans-unit.source: The default is 0.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é 0.

trans-unit.source: Enlarges this <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> by the specified amount.
trans-unit.target: Amplia isso <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> pelo valor especificado.

trans-unit.source: This method enlarges this rectangle, not a copy of it.
trans-unit.target: Esse método aumenta esse retângulo, não uma cópia dele.

trans-unit.source: The rectangle is enlarged in both directions along an axis.
trans-unit.target: O retângulo é ampliado em ambas as direções ao longo do eixo.

trans-unit.source: For example, if a 50 by 50 rectangle is enlarged by 50 in the x-axis, the resultant rectangle will be 150 units long (the original 50, the 50 in the minus direction, and the 50 in the plus direction) maintaining the rectangle's geometric center.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se um retângulo 50 por 50 é ampliado por 50 no eixo x, o retângulo resultante será 150 unidades longo (o original 50, 50 na direção menos e 50 na direção adição) manter centro Geométrico do retângulo.

trans-unit.source: The amount to inflate this rectangle.
trans-unit.target: O valor para aumentar esse retângulo.

trans-unit.source: Enlarges this <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> by the specified amount.
trans-unit.target: Amplia isso <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> pelo valor especificado.

trans-unit.source: This method enlarges this rectangle, not a copy of it.
trans-unit.target: Esse método aumenta esse retângulo, não uma cópia dele.

trans-unit.source: The rectangle is enlarged in both directions along an axis.
trans-unit.target: O retângulo é ampliado em ambas as direções ao longo do eixo.

trans-unit.source: For example, if a 50 by 50 rectangle is enlarged by 50 in the x-axis, the resultant rectangle will be 150 units long (the original 50, the 50 in the minus direction, and the 50 in the plus direction) maintaining the rectangle's geometric center.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se um retângulo 50 por 50 é ampliado por 50 no eixo x, o retângulo resultante será 150 unidades longo (o original 50, 50 na direção menos e 50 na direção adição) manter centro Geométrico do retângulo.

trans-unit.source: If either `x` or `y` is negative, the <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle> structure is deflated in the corresponding direction.
trans-unit.target: Se qualquer um dos `x` ou `y` for negativo, o <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle>estrutura está vazio na direção correspondente.</xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle>

trans-unit.source: The amount to inflate this <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> horizontally.
trans-unit.target: O valor para aumentar esse <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> horizontalmente.

trans-unit.source: The amount to inflate this <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> vertically.
trans-unit.target: O valor para aumentar esse <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> verticalmente.

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns an enlarged copy of the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> structure.
trans-unit.target: Cria e retorna uma cópia ampliada especificada <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> estrutura.

trans-unit.source: The copy is enlarged by the specified amount.
trans-unit.target: A cópia é ampliada pelo valor especificado.

trans-unit.source: The original <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> structure remains unmodified.
trans-unit.target: O original <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> estrutura permanece inalterada.

trans-unit.source: This method makes a copy of `rect`, enlarges the copy, and then returns the enlarged copy.
trans-unit.target: Este método faz uma cópia do `rect`, aumenta a cópia e, em seguida, retorna a cópia ampliada.

trans-unit.source: The rectangle is enlarged in both directions along an axis.
trans-unit.target: O retângulo é ampliado em ambas as direções ao longo do eixo.

trans-unit.source: For example, if a 50 by 50 rectangle is enlarged by 50 in the x-axis, the resultant rectangle will be 150 units long (the original 50, the 50 in the minus direction, and the 50 in the plus direction) maintaining the rectangle's geometric center.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se um retângulo 50 por 50 é ampliado por 50 no eixo x, o retângulo resultante será 150 unidades longo (o original 50, 50 na direção menos e 50 na direção adição) manter centro Geométrico do retângulo.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> with which to start.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> com a qual iniciar.

trans-unit.source: This rectangle is not modified.
trans-unit.target: Esse retângulo não é modificado.

trans-unit.source: The amount to inflate this <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> horizontally.
trans-unit.target: O valor para aumentar esse <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> horizontalmente.

trans-unit.source: The amount to inflate this <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> vertically.
trans-unit.target: O valor para aumentar esse <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> verticalmente.

trans-unit.source: The enlarged <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O ampliada <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Replaces this <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> with the intersection of itself and the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Substitui esse <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> com a interseção de si mesmo e especificado <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> with which to intersect.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> com a qual se cruzam.

trans-unit.source: Returns a third <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> structure that represents the intersection of two other <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> structures.
trans-unit.target: Retorna um terceiro <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> estrutura que representa a interseção de dois outros <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> estruturas.

trans-unit.source: If there is no intersection, an empty <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> is returned.
trans-unit.target: Se não houver nenhuma interseção, vazio <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> é retornado.

trans-unit.source: A rectangle to intersect.
trans-unit.target: Um retângulo para intersect.

trans-unit.source: A rectangle to intersect.
trans-unit.target: Um retângulo para intersect.

trans-unit.source: A that represents the intersection of a and b.
trans-unit.target: Um que representa a interseção de a e b .

trans-unit.source: Determines if this rectangle intersects with rect.
trans-unit.target: Determina se esse retângulo faz interseção com rect .

trans-unit.source: The rectangle to test.
trans-unit.target: O retângulo para testar.

trans-unit.source: This method returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if there is any intersection, otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Este método retorna <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref> se não houver nenhuma interseção, caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Tests whether all numeric properties of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> have values of zero.
trans-unit.target: Testes se todas as propriedades numéricas deste <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> têm valores de zero.

trans-unit.source: This property returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Width*>, <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Height*>, <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.X*>, and <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Y*> properties of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> all have values of zero; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade retorna <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref> se o <> </> *>, <> </> *>, <> </> *>, e <> </> *> propriedades desse <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> todos têm valores de zero; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the x-coordinate of the left edge of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> structure.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a coordenada x do canto superior esquerdo desse <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> estrutura.

trans-unit.source: The x-coordinate of the left edge of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> structure.
trans-unit.target: A coordenada x do canto superior esquerdo desse <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> estrutura.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the coordinates of the upper-left corner of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> structure.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define as coordenadas do canto superior esquerdo desta <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> estrutura.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> that represents the upper-left corner of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> structure.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"> </xref> que representa o canto superior esquerdo desta <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> estrutura.

trans-unit.source: Adjusts the location of this rectangle by the specified amount.
trans-unit.target: Ajusta o local deste retângulo pelo valor especificado.

trans-unit.source: This method adjusts the location of the upper-left corner horizontally by the x-coordinate of the specified point, and vertically by the y-coordinate of the specified point.
trans-unit.target: Este método ajusta horizontalmente o local do canto superior esquerdo, a coordenada x do ponto especificado e verticalmente a coordenada y do ponto especificado.

trans-unit.source: Amount to offset the location.
trans-unit.target: Quantidade para deslocar o local.

trans-unit.source: Adjusts the location of this rectangle by the specified amount.
trans-unit.target: Ajusta o local deste retângulo pelo valor especificado.

trans-unit.source: The horizontal offset.
trans-unit.target: O deslocamento horizontal.

trans-unit.source: The vertical offset.
trans-unit.target: O deslocamento vertical.

trans-unit.source: Tests whether two <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> structures have equal location and size.
trans-unit.target: Testa se dois <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> estruturas têm igual local e o tamanho.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> structure that is to the left of the equality operator.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> estrutura está à esquerda do operador de igualdade.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> structure that is to the right of the equality operator.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> estrutura está à direita do operador de igualdade.

trans-unit.source: This operator returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the two <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> structures have equal <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.X*>, <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Y*>, <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Width*>, and <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Height*> properties.
trans-unit.target: Esse operador retorna <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref> se os dois <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> estruturas têm igual <> </> *>, <> </> *>, <> </> *>, e <> </> *> propriedades.

trans-unit.source: Tests whether two <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> structures differ in location or size.
trans-unit.target: Testa se dois <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> estruturas diferem no local ou tamanho.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> structure that is to the left of the inequality operator.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> estrutura está à esquerda do operador de desigualdade.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> structure that is to the right of the inequality operator.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> estrutura está à direita do operador de desigualdade.

trans-unit.source: This operator returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if any of the <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.X*>, <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Y*>, <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Width*> or <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Height*> properties of the two <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> structures are unequal; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Esse operador retorna <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref> se qualquer uma da <> </> *>, <> </> *>, <> </> *> ou <> </> *> propriedades dos dois <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> estruturas forem diferentes; caso contrário <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the x-coordinate that is the sum of <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.X*> and <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Width*> property values of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> structure.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a coordenada x é a soma de <> </> *> e <> </> *> valores de propriedade deste <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> estrutura.

trans-unit.source: The value of the Right property represents the x-coordinate of the first point at the right edge of the rectangle that is not contained in the rectangle.
trans-unit.target: O valor da propriedade à direita representa a coordenada x do primeiro ponto na borda direita do retângulo que não está contido no retângulo.

trans-unit.source: The x-coordinate that is the sum of <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.X*> and <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Width*> of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A coordenada x é a soma de <> </> *> e <> </> *> deste <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Converts the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"></xref> to a <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> by rounding the <xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"></xref> values to the nearest integer values.
trans-unit.target: Converte especificado <xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"> </xref> para um <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> , arredondando a <xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"> </xref> valores para os valores de número inteiro mais próximos.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"></xref> to be converted.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"> </xref> a ser convertido.

trans-unit.source: The rounded interger value of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O valor de número inteiro arredondado do <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the size of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o tamanho desse <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> that represents the width and height of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> structure.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"> </xref> que representa a largura e altura deste <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> estrutura.

trans-unit.source: Gets the y-coordinate of the top edge of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> structure.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a coordenada y do canto superior deste <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> estrutura.

trans-unit.source: The y-coordinate of the top edge of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> structure.
trans-unit.target: A coordenada y do canto superior deste <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> estrutura.

trans-unit.source: Converts the attributes of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> to a human-readable string.
trans-unit.target: Converte os atributos deste <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> para uma cadeia de caracteres legível.

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the position, width, and height of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> structure ¾ for example, {X=20, Y=20, Width=100, Height=50}
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia de caracteres que contém a posição, largura e altura deste <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> estrutura ¾ por exemplo, {X =&20;,&20; = Y, largura =&100;, altura =&50;}

trans-unit.source: Converts the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"></xref> to a <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> by truncating the <xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Converte especificado <xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"> </xref> para um <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> truncando o <xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"> </xref> valores.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"></xref> to be converted.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"> </xref> a ser convertido.

trans-unit.source: The truncated value of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O valor truncado do <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> structure that contains the union of two <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> structures.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> estrutura que contém a união de dois <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> estruturas.

trans-unit.source: When one of the two rectangles is empty, meaning all of its values are zero, the Union method returns a rectangle with a starting point of (0, 0), and the height and width of the non-empty rectangle.
trans-unit.target: Quando um dos dois retângulos estiver vazio, o que significa que todos os seus valores são zero, o método Union retorna um retângulo com um ponto de partida de (0, 0) e a altura e a largura do retângulo não vazio.

trans-unit.source: For example, if you have two rectangles: A = (0, 0; 0, 0) and B = (1, 1; 2, 2), then the union of A and B is (0, 0; 2, 2).
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se você tiver dois retângulos: A = (0, 0; 0, 0) e B = (1, 1; 2, 2), em seguida, a união de A e B é (0, 0; 2, 2).

trans-unit.source: A rectangle to union.
trans-unit.target: Um retângulo a união.

trans-unit.source: A rectangle to union.
trans-unit.target: Um retângulo a união.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> structure that bounds the union of the two <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> structures.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> estrutura que circunda a união dos dois <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> estruturas.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the width of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> structure.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a largura deste <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> estrutura.

trans-unit.source: Changing the Width property will also cause a change in the <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Right%2A> property of the <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle>.
trans-unit.target: Alterando a propriedade Width também fará com que uma alteração na <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Right%2A>propriedade de <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle>.</xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle> </xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Right%2A>

trans-unit.source: The units the rectangle is drawn in is determined by the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.PageUnit%2A> and <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.PageScale%2A> properties of the graphics object used for drawing.
trans-unit.target: As unidades que o retângulo é desenhado em é determinado pelo <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.PageUnit%2A>e <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.PageScale%2A>Propriedades dos gráficos de objeto usado para desenhar.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.PageScale%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.PageUnit%2A>

trans-unit.source: The default unit is pixels.
trans-unit.target: A unidade padrão é pixels.

trans-unit.source: The width of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> structure.
trans-unit.target: A largura deste <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> estrutura.

trans-unit.source: The default is 0.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é 0.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the x-coordinate of the upper-left corner of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> structure.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a coordenada x do canto superior esquerdo desta <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> estrutura.

trans-unit.source: Changing the X property will also cause a change in the <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Right%2A> property of the <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle>.
trans-unit.target: Alterando a propriedade X também fará com que uma alteração na <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Right%2A>propriedade de <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle>.</xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle> </xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Right%2A>

trans-unit.source: The x-coordinate of the upper-left corner of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> structure.
trans-unit.target: A coordenada x do canto superior esquerdo desta <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> estrutura.

trans-unit.source: The default is 0.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é 0.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the y-coordinate of the upper-left corner of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> structure.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a coordenada y do canto superior esquerdo desta <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> estrutura.

trans-unit.source: Changing the Y property will also cause a change in the <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Bottom%2A> property of the <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle>.
trans-unit.target: Alterando a propriedade Y também fará com que uma alteração na <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Bottom%2A>propriedade de <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle>.</xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle> </xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Bottom%2A>

trans-unit.source: The y-coordinate of the upper-left corner of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> structure.
trans-unit.target: A coordenada y do canto superior esquerdo desta <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> estrutura.

trans-unit.source: The default is 0.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é 0.
